channel.title: Yet Another Court Wizard Thread
channel.description:
My entry to the contest. (Can mods even enter the contest? :thinking: oh well.)
> # [color=steblue]The Court Wizard[/color] > Blue Dragon Support **Wisdom (Passive)** - Trollbox, Silence and Chill have no effect on the Court Wizard. Anyone who tries to use a Trollbox, Silence or Chill on the court wizard will instead use it on themself and the Court Wizard will be notified someone attempted. **Magical Barrier (Day)** - Tonight, the targeted player will be immune to negative effects such as conversion, occupation and target changing. - Unlimited Uses. **Prestidigitation (Night)** - Attempt to control a player, choosing who they will target tonight. - 2 Uses. (Doesn't work on occupy immune players or players who do not target.) **You Shall Not Pass! (Night)** - Prevent all visitors to a target. (cannot target king.) - 2 Uses.
> # [color=purple]The Sage[/color] > Unseen Offensive **Silver Tongue (Passive)** - Trollbox, Silence and Chill have no effect on the Sage. Anyone who tries to use a Trollbox, Silence or Chill on the Sage will instead use it on themself and the Sage will be notified someone attempted. **Thunderbolt (Night)** - Zap a player, causing them to target themself tonight. (Doesn't work on occupy immune classes.) - Unlimited uses. **Wall of Fire (Night)** - Prevent all players other than The Assassin and Mastermind from visiting your target. - 1 Use.

item.title: Yet Another Court Wizard Thread
item.dc:creator: Marluxion
item.description:
My entry to the contest. (Can mods even enter the contest? oh well.)

The Court Wizard

Blue Dragon Support
Wisdom (Passive) - Trollbox, Silence and Chill have no effect on the Court Wizard. Anyone who tries to use a Trollbox, Silence or Chill on the court wizard will instead use it on themself and the Court Wizard will be notified someone attempted.
Magical Barrier (Day) - Tonight, the targeted player will be immune to negative effects such as conversion, occupation and target changing. - Unlimited Uses.
Prestidigitation (Night) - Attempt to control a player, choosing who they will target tonight. - 2 Uses. (Doesn’t work on occupy immune players or players who do not target.)
You Shall Not Pass! (Night) - Prevent all visitors to a target. (cannot target king.) - 2 Uses.

The Sage

Unseen Offensive
Silver Tongue (Passive) - Trollbox, Silence and Chill have no effect on the Sage. Anyone who tries to use a Trollbox, Silence or Chill on the Sage will instead use it on themself and the Sage will be notified someone attempted.
Thunderbolt (Night) - Zap a player, causing them to target themself tonight. (Doesn’t work on occupy immune classes.) - Unlimited uses.
Wall of Fire (Night) - Prevent all players other than The Assassin and Mastermind from visiting your target. - 1 Use.

Read full topic
